topic.title: Schematron Validation with Quick Fixes and XSLT Extensions

body.p: The AI Positron Assistant add-on contributes custom XSLT extension functions which allows creating custom Schematron rules or quick fixes which use AI.
Open the topic and validate it. The validation error has an associated quick fix which uses AI to compact the short description to fit a certain number of words.
These AI extension functions can also be used in XSLT Stylesheets which are used for XML refactoring or for regular XSLT processing and use AI to process content in certain ways.
